text.section:
Before making the first sale in the State of a fluid, material, or other item, in a prepackaged form, imported into the State that purports to be a substitute for or improver of motor fuel, the seller shall:
submit the item to the Comptroller for inspection;
label the item in a way that the Comptroller approves; and
obtain authorization for the sale from the Comptroller.
If a material change is made in an item authorized for sale under this section, the item shall be resubmitted to the Comptroller for authorization.
The Comptroller shall order the removal from the State of an unauthorized item offered for sale.
